description: A Use After Free (CWE-416) vulnerability exists in Zelio Soft 2 v5.1 and prior versions which could cause remote code execution when opening a specially crafted Zelio Soft project file.

product.name: Zelio Soft 2 v5.1 and prior versions

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Zelio Soft 2 v5.1 and prior versions
